headline: Republican 'unforced errors' threaten path to Senate control
author: Associated Press
sentences: And a surprise plan that would raise taxes is putting Republican candidates on the defensive in states including Wisconsin, Ohio and Florida.
WASHINGTON (AP) — Republican missteps that include intense infighting are threatening the GOP’s path to the Senate majority.
Republican candidates in virtually every major battleground state are struggling to keep pace with Democratic fundraising.
Doug Ducey dealt his party its latest setback by announcing he would not challenge Democratic Sen. Mark Kelly this fall.
